text: Marian Lupu (; born 20 June 1966) is a Moldovan politician. He was the President of the Parliament of Moldova between 2010 and 2013. From this position he was Acting President of the Republic from 2010 until 2012.Marian Lupu: Din punct de vedere științific, vorbesc limba română, din punct de vedere politic - limba moldovenească! , unimedia.info ==References== Category:1966 births Category:Presidents of Moldova Category:Living people
title: Marian Lupu
